proposed_skills_ranked.name: communication-calibrator
proposed_skills_ranked.why_now: Style adaptation should be measured, not guessed.
proposed_skills_ranked.v1: Score outputs for directness, clarity, and filler.

proposed_skills_ranked.name: lesson-distiller
proposed_skills_ranked.why_now: Persistent learning needs automatic daily distillation.
proposed_skills_ranked.v1: Extract 3-5 durable lessons with confidence and source tags.

proposed_skills_ranked.name: skill-suggester
proposed_skills_ranked.why_now: Repeated workflows should become reusable skills.
proposed_skills_ranked.v1: Detect repetitive workflows and generate draft skill specs.
